competitors.name: Palo Alto Networks
competitors.notes: Most notable competitor, offering Cortex XDR platform with similar features

competitors.name: McAfee
competitors.notes: Wide range of cybersecurity products including advanced threat defense

competitors.name: SentinelOne
competitors.notes: AI and machine learning-based endpoint protection, 7.79% market share

competitors.name: Carbon Black
competitors.notes: VMware's cloud-native endpoint protection with strong EDR and threat-hunting

competitors.name: Symantec
competitors.notes: Now Broadcom. Longstanding cybersecurity leader with extensive endpoint, network, and cloud security

competitors.name: Cisco
competitors.notes: Broad cybersecurity portfolio including endpoint protection. Talos threat intelligence team

competitors.name: Mandiant
competitors.notes: Threat intelligence and incident response competitor

competitors.name: Sophos
competitors.notes: Endpoint security provider for SMB and enterprise

context: By 2020, CrowdStrike was a well-established leader in the EDR/endpoint security market. The competitive landscape included both traditional security vendors and next-generation competitors like SentinelOne and Carbon Black.
